function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 through the handling and sharing of wearable devices","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection among individuals","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for cleaning and disinfecting wearable devices after each use","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection technology, antimicrobial coatings for wearable surfaces","People":"Users of wearable devices, healthcare workers, and individuals in close contact with device users","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, wearable device manufacturers, and users"}]}
